content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":4201,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………気のせいか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Was it just my imagination...?\""},{"lineNumber":4202,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちっ、雑魚が……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tch, these small fry...\""},{"lineNumber":4203,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ばあ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Boo!\""},{"lineNumber":4204,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うっ、うおおおおおっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, whoaahhh!?\""},{"lineNumber":4205,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んん……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm...?\""},{"lineNumber":4206,"originalJapaneseLine":"いきなり出てきたちぬをとっさに草むらに","translatedEnglishLine":"He instantly dragged Chinu, who suddenly appeared, into the grass,"},{"lineNumber":4207,"originalJapaneseLine":"引きずり込んで、ランスは息を殺した。","translatedEnglishLine":"and Rance held his breath."},{"lineNumber":4208,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いないなあ……ううーん、疲れてるかなー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"They're not around... Hmm, maybe they're tired—\""},{"lineNumber":4209,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふぅ……敵がアホで助かった」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Phew... Lucky the enemies are idiots.\""},{"lineNumber":4210,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ドキドキだねっ……♪」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"My heart's pounding...♪\""},{"lineNumber":4211,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こういう時に悪い冗談はよせ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don't make bad jokes at times like this."},{"lineNumber":4212,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ちっとヤバイ状況だからな」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's a bit of a dangerous situation.\""},{"lineNumber":4213,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うんうん。楽しいね……♪」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, yeah. It's fun...♪\""},{"lineNumber":4214,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………あのなあ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...You know,\""},{"lineNumber":4215,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランスたまは、楽しくない？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Rance-tama, aren't you having fun?\""},{"lineNumber":4216,"originalJapaneseLine":"「楽しくない。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, I'm not having fun."},{"lineNumber":4217,"originalJapaneseLine":"　はぐれた愚か者どもも捜さにゃならんし、","translatedEnglishLine":"I also have to search for the strayed fools,"},{"lineNumber":4218,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔物どもの数は多すぎる」","translatedEnglishLine":"and there are just too many monsters.\""},{"lineNumber":4219,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いいね。生きてる感じするね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's good. It feels like we're alive.\""},{"lineNumber":4220,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ったく、毛利の連中は…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Really, those Mouri guys...\""},{"lineNumber":4221,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だって、死んでたら分かんないよ？　ぜんぶ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Because if they're dead, they wouldn't know a thing. Everything.\""},{"lineNumber":4222,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぬ…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ngh...\""},{"lineNumber":4223,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちぬ、死んじゃったときは、ふわーっとして……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"When Chinu died, it felt like drifting softly..."},{"lineNumber":4224,"originalJapaneseLine":"　痛くも苦しくもなかったけど……」","translatedEnglishLine":"It neither hurt nor was painful...\""},{"lineNumber":4225,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも、ちっとも楽しくなかったよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But it wasn't fun at all."},{"lineNumber":4226,"originalJapaneseLine":"　嬉しくもなかった」","translatedEnglishLine":"I wasn't happy either.\""},{"lineNumber":4227,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちぬは、今の方がいいな……って☆」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Chinu thinks now is better...☆\""},{"lineNumber":4228,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........................\""},{"lineNumber":4229,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まったく仕方がないな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Honestly, it can't be helped."},{"lineNumber":4230,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ちぬちゃんがそう言うならそれでいいか」","translatedEnglishLine":"If Chinu-chan says so, then I guess that's fine.\""},{"lineNumber":4231,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちぬ、ランスたまはいつものランスたまが","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Chinu, I like the usual Rance-tama"},{"lineNumber":4232,"originalJapaneseLine":"　一番好きかな☆」","translatedEnglishLine":"the best☆\""},{"lineNumber":4233,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふんっ……がははははははは！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph... Gahahahahahaha!"},{"lineNumber":4234,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まったく、世話の焼ける奴らの分まで","translatedEnglishLine":"Really, I have to do everything for those troublesome fools,"},{"lineNumber":4235,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺様がやらなきゃならんということか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"don’t I have to do it myself!\""},{"lineNumber":4236,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ…………！？　人間……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...!? A human...\""},{"lineNumber":4237,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やかましいわ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Shut up!"},{"lineNumber":4238,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ラーーーンスアッタタターーーック！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Raaaaaance Atta-ta-taaaack!\""},{"lineNumber":4239,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さっさと合流するぞ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Let's hurry and regroup!"},{"lineNumber":4240,"originalJapaneseLine":"　邪魔する奴は皆殺しだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Anyone who gets in the way will be killed!\""},{"lineNumber":4241,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃーーーっ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kyaaahhh!\""},{"lineNumber":4242,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ちぬも紅茶、たっくさん飲ませちゃう……☆」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Chinu will make you drink lots and lots of tea...☆\""},{"lineNumber":4243,"originalJapaneseLine":"二人は包囲網を、強行突破していった。","translatedEnglishLine":"The two of them forced their way through the encirclement."},{"lineNumber":4244,"originalJapaneseLine":"――その夜は、季節外れの熱帯夜だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"—That night was an unseasonably hot tropical night."},{"lineNumber":4245,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……うぅ、くそ、ッ……暑い……暑いぞ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Ugh, damn it... It's hot... so hot...\""},{"lineNumber":4246,"originalJapaneseLine":"　寝苦しい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Cannot sleep well...\""},{"lineNumber":4247,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くそ。水風呂でも浴びて……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Damn. Maybe I'll take a cold bath..."},{"lineNumber":4248,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ダメだな、その後に暑くなるに決まってる。","translatedEnglishLine":"No good, it'll just get hot afterwards for sure."},{"lineNumber":4249,"originalJapaneseLine":"　シィルでも呼び出して、一晩中魔法で……","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe I should summon Shel and use magic all night..."},{"lineNumber":4250,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うふふ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ufufu\""},{"lineNumber":4251,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そーんな時は、ちぬにお任せ☆」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"At times like that, leave it to Chinu☆\""},{"lineNumber":4252,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん、ちぬちゃんか……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hm, Chinu-chan...?\""},{"lineNumber":4253,"originalJapaneseLine":"「遊びに来たよー、ランスたまー☆」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I came to play, Rance-tama☆\""},{"lineNumber":4254,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はらり」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"(Soft rustle)\""},{"lineNumber":4255,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh!\""},{"lineNumber":4256,"originalJapaneseLine":"「布団に入るのに服着てるの、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Isn't it weird to wear clothes when getting into bed?"},{"lineNumber":4257,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おかしいよね？　というわけでごそごそ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"So, I'm going to fumble around and...\""},{"lineNumber":4258,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちぬは服を脱ぐと、","translatedEnglishLine":"Chinu took off her clothes,"},{"lineNumber":4259,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスの布団に潜り込んでいった。","translatedEnglishLine":"and slipped into Rance's futon."},{"lineNumber":4260,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや別におかしくは…………","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, it's not really weird..."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いきなり出てきたちぬをとっさに草むらに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He instantly dragged Chinu, who suddenly appeared, into the grass,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 引きずり込んで、ランスは息を殺した。
「いないなあ……ううーん、疲れてるかなー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They're not around... Hmm, maybe they're tired—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こういう時に悪い冗談はよせ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't make bad jokes at times like this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちっとヤバイ状況だからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a bit of a dangerous situation."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はぐれた愚か者どもも捜さにゃならんし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I also have to search for the strayed fools,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物どもの数は多すぎる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and there are just too many monsters."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいね。生きてる感じするね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's good. It feels like we're alive."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だって、死んでたら分かんないよ？　ぜんぶ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because if they're dead, they wouldn't know a thing. Everything."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちぬ、死んじゃったときは、ふわーっとして……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "When Chinu died, it felt like drifting softly...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 痛くも苦しくもなかったけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It neither hurt nor was painful..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも、ちっとも楽しくなかったよ。
「ちぬは、今の方がいいな……って☆」
ちぬちゃんがそう言うならそれでいいか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If Chinu-chan says so, then I guess that's fine."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちぬ、ランスたまはいつものランスたまが
まったく、世話の焼ける奴らの分まで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Really, I have to do everything for those troublesome fools,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様がやらなきゃならんということか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: don’t I have to do it myself!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラーーーンスアッタタターーーック！」
邪魔する奴は皆殺しだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anyone who gets in the way will be killed!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちぬも紅茶、たっくさん飲ませちゃう……☆」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Chinu will make you drink lots and lots of tea...☆"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人は包囲網を、強行突破していった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The two of them forced their way through the encirclement.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――その夜は、季節外れの熱帯夜だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: —That night was an unseasonably hot tropical night.
"...Ugh, damn it... It's hot... so hot..."
"Damn. Maybe I'll take a cold bath...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダメだな、その後に暑くなるに決まってる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No good, it'll just get hot afterwards for sure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルでも呼び出して、一晩中魔法で……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe I should summon Shel and use magic all night...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そーんな時は、ちぬにお任せ☆」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "At times like that, leave it to Chinu☆"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「遊びに来たよー、ランスたまー☆」
「布団に入るのに服着てるの、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Isn't it weird to wear clothes when getting into bed?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おかしいよね？　というわけでごそごそ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, I'm going to fumble around and..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの布団に潜り込んでいった。

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いきなり出てきたちぬをとっさに草むらに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He instantly dragged Chinu, who suddenly appeared, into the grass,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 引きずり込んで、ランスは息を殺した。
「いないなあ……ううーん、疲れてるかなー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They're not around... Hmm, maybe they're tired—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こういう時に悪い冗談はよせ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't make bad jokes at times like this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちっとヤバイ状況だからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a bit of a dangerous situation."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はぐれた愚か者どもも捜さにゃならんし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I also have to search for the strayed fools,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物どもの数は多すぎる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and there are just too many monsters."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいね。生きてる感じするね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's good. It feels like we're alive."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だって、死んでたら分かんないよ？　ぜんぶ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because if they're dead, they wouldn't know a thing. Everything."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちぬ、死んじゃったときは、ふわーっとして……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "When Chinu died, it felt like drifting softly...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 痛くも苦しくもなかったけど……」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも、ちっとも楽しくなかったよ。

ちぬちゃんがそう言うならそれでいいか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If Chinu-chan says so, then I guess that's fine."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちぬ、ランスたまはいつものランスたまが
まったく、世話の焼ける奴らの分まで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Really, I have to do everything for those troublesome fools,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様がやらなきゃならんということか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: don’t I have to do it myself!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラーーーンスアッタタターーーック！」
邪魔する奴は皆殺しだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anyone who gets in the way will be killed!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちぬも紅茶、たっくさん飲ませちゃう……☆」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Chinu will make you drink lots and lots of tea...☆"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人は包囲網を、強行突破していった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The two of them forced their way through the encirclement.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――その夜は、季節外れの熱帯夜だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: —That night was an unseasonably hot tropical night.
"...Ugh, damn it... It's hot... so hot..."
"Damn. Maybe I'll take a cold bath...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダメだな、その後に暑くなるに決まってる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No good, it'll just get hot afterwards for sure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルでも呼び出して、一晩中魔法で……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe I should summon Shel and use magic all night...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そーんな時は、ちぬにお任せ☆」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "At times like that, leave it to Chinu☆"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「遊びに来たよー、ランスたまー☆」
「布団に入るのに服着てるの、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Isn't it weird to wear clothes when getting into bed?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おかしいよね？　というわけでごそごそ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, I'm going to fumble around and..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの布団に潜り込んでいった。
